sentences: Preston Anthony Chin (born July 21, 1991), better known by his stage name Robotaki, is a Canadian DJ and producer, based in Montreal, Quebec.
Based in Montreal, Chin has a Master's degree in genetics, from McGill University.
Born in Toronto, Chin began using the stage name Robotaki, a derivation from the grilled Japanese food robatayaki.
In 2013, he self-released the song "It's Still About You" featuring Chicago-based group Hey Champ and Sean Kirk better known as DJ SK .
In 2015, Robotaki remixed Strange Talk's "Painted in Gold".
In 2016, he produced an official remix of The Chainsmokers' single "Closer".
Later that year, he released "Right Time" as a single.
In July 2017, he collaborated with Manila Killa for the single "I Want You".
